fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All aspects of Single Market policy, but in particular policy issues relating to sales of goods and services to consumers.  All aspects of food policy but in particular issues relating to food information and labelling, nutrition and food safety.  International trade.  Environment and sustainability policy. Brexit.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: The BRC is a member of EuroCommerce, the European association for the wholesale and retail sectors.  The BRC is also a member of the Foreign Trade association.
goals__remit: To make a positive difference for our members and to advance the interests of UK retailers with policy makers and stakeholders.
